name: Roll-Chan 4
overview:
In the year 20XX, after the death of Dr. Wily, peace was restored but only for a short time because a new menace have emerged in the guise of the mysterious Dr. Cossack who threatens the world. But his true plan is to eliminate Roll by sending off his very own Robot Masters against her.

But what is Dr. Cossacks true motives? Roll must make the initiative and defeat the Robots Masters first before they get her and get to Dr. Cossack himself to answer!

With this new challenge, Roll doesn't fall short against new powerful enemies as she is equipped with a new weapon - the New Roll Buster, a powerful charged shot. Fighting with her is her trusted robot cat, Tango the transforming kitty; and a new support unit, Eddie the walking canister!
